name: BChannelComponent
sample: <BChannelComponent hintText='Döviz Cinsi' labelText='Döviz Cinsi' displayMemberPath='channelName' /*Not Required*/ />

infoArray.name: selectedChannelId
infoArray.desc: Determines the Channel that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: channelIdList
infoArray.desc: Filter the Channels by given channel Ids.

infoArray.name: isAllOptionIncluded
infoArray.desc: If true an item will push to the first row of the Channel list. Default value is false.

infoArray.name: allOptionDescription
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true. Default value is 'Hepsi'

infoArray.name: allOptionValue
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true.. Default value is 'null'

infoArray.name: labelText
infoArray.desc: The content of the floating label.

infoArray.name: disableSearch
infoArray.desc: Display the search input field top of the channel component.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the Channel component will be disabled. Default valuse is false

infoArray.name: setValuesByIds(channelIdList)
infoArray.desc: Set the Channels by channel Ids

infoArray.name: setValues(channelList)
infoArray.desc: Set the Channels by your custom Channels

infoArray.name: onChannelSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the channel has been selected.
